alert.note: Alert for Pike; Wayne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 22 at 6:57PM EDT until April 22 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Sullivan County in central New York... Northeastern Wayne County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Northeastern Pike County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 656 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Callicoon to near Eldred to near Milford, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fallsburg, Monticello, Lackawaxen, Liberty, Bethel, Damascus, Neversink, South Fallsburg, Callicoon and Shohola. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
